item.title: Ethereum first dapp - part 3
item.description: setting up a light wallet In order to have a setup close to what the DAPP would be, we will use (metamask) [http://www.metamask.io] as a light wallet (there are other choices). Metamask allows you to connect to a custom node. We will then connect to our node, http://localhost:9012 If everthing is fine, metamasks should indicate it’s connected. Then, we can import the metamask account to our local node by simply specifying the datadir we have setup the node data.
